info.title: About the Ideal Weight Calculator
info.description: This calculator estimates your ideal weight based on your height and gender using four recognized scientific formulas: Robinson (1983), Miller (1983), Devine (1974), and Hamwi (1964). It also calculates a healthy weight range based on the Body Mass Index (BMI) recommended by WHO.
info.robinsonFormula:
Men: 52 kg + 1.9 kg per inch over 5 feet
Women: 49 kg + 1.7 kg per inch over 5 feet
info.millerFormula:
Men: 56.2 kg + 1.41 kg per inch over 5 feet
Women: 53.1 kg + 1.36 kg per inch over 5 feet
info.devineFormula:
Men: 50 kg + 2.3 kg per inch over 5 feet
Women: 45.5 kg + 2.3 kg per inch over 5 feet
info.hamwiFormula:
Men: 48 kg + 2.7 kg per inch over 5 feet
Women: 45.5 kg + 2.2 kg per inch over 5 feet
info.limitations: These formulas provide general estimates of ideal weight. Actual ideal weight may vary based on body composition, bone structure, muscle mass, and other individual factors. Consult with a healthcare professional for a personalized assessment.
